sentences.en: A capitalist will not stick at any meanness in making money.
sentences.cn: 只要能赚钱,资本家什么卑鄙的勾当都干得出来.

sentences.en: An economic crisis engulfed the entire capitalist world.
sentences.cn: 经济危机席卷了整个资本主义世界.

sentences.en: Every capitalist went about with a gang of lackeys who -'
sentences.cn: 资本家每人都带着一帮走狗 —— ”

sentences.en: Factory producing such goods is then mostly in the hand of capitalist.
sentences.cn: 生产这种产品的工厂那时大部分掌握在资本家手里.

sentences.en: It is pair of capitalist profundity, adj, of the history analyse.
sentences.cn: 它是对资本主义的深刻的 、 辩证的 、 历史的剖析.

sentences.en: Lenin had hoped to even have a working relationship with the capitalists.
sentences.cn: 列宁甚至曾希望能与资本主义者建立合作关系。

sentences.en: Marx's work was more than a critical study of capitalist production.
sentences.cn: 马克思的著作不仅仅是对资本主义生产的批判性研究。

sentences.en: Some cynics say that sport is a mere instrument of capitalist domination.
sentences.cn: 一些愤世嫉俗者认为体育不过是资本主义统治的工具而已.

sentences.en: The capitalist cheated the workers over their wages.
sentences.cn: 资本家少算了工人工资.

sentences.en: The capitalist told them not to be insolent, and spoke to them about honesty.
sentences.cn: 资本家告诉他们休得蛮横无理, 叫他们老实一点.

sentences.en: The crisis set back the entire economy of the capitalist world.
sentences.cn: 这次危机使资本主义世界的经济全面衰退.

sentences.en: The voyages of discovery synchronized with the emergence of capitalist economy.
sentences.cn: 发现新大陆的航海与资本主义经济之出现同时发生.

sentences.en: The workers distrusted the large promises made by the capitalist.
sentences.cn: 工人们不相信资本家的慷慨诺言.

sentences.en: The wronged tenant turned out to be also the wealthy capitalist.
sentences.cn: 受害的房客结果被发现也是阔绰的资本家.

sentences.en: There is a convergence between capitalist firms and co-operatives in terms of business strategy.
sentences.cn: 资本主义公司和合作企业在经营战略方面趋于一致。

sentences.en: We have chosen the peaceful transformation of capitalist industry and commerce.
sentences.cn: 我们对资本主义工商业采用了和平改造的办法.
